name: Tetzimoc, Primal Death
immunities: fire, poison; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the elder dinosaur fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The elder dinosaur has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: The elder dinosaur deals double damage to objects and structures.

traits.name: Spiny Carapace
traits.desc: The elder dinosaur is covered in an armored carapace bristling with thick, sharp spines. Any creature that hits or misses Tetzimoc with a melee attack takes 7 (2d6) piercing damage.

traits.name: Tail Spike Regrowth
traits.desc: The elder dinosaur has forty tail spikes. Used spikes regrow when the elder dinosaur finishes a long rest.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The elder dinosaur can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes five attacks: one with its bite, two with its claws, one with its horns, and one with its tail. It can use its tail spikes in place of any or all of those attacks, and it can use its Swallow instead of its bite.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +19 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 36 (4d12 + 10) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 20). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the elder dinosaur can’t bite another target.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +19 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (4d8 + 10) slashing damage.

actions.name: Horns
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +19 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 32 (4d10 + 10) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +19 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 24 (4d6 + 10) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 20 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Tail Spikes
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, range 100/300 ft., two targets. Hit: 7 (2d6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.desc: Each creature of the elder dinosaur’s choice within 120 feet of it and aware of it must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the elder dinosaur is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature’s saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the elder dinosaur’s Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Swallow
actions.desc: The elder dinosaur makes one bite attack against a Large or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, that creature takes the bite’s damage, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the elder dinosaur, and it takes 56 (16d6) acid damage at the start of each of the elder dinosaur’s turns. If the elder dinosaur takes 60 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, it must succeed on a DC 20 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of it. If the elder dinosaur dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting prone.

legendary.name: Attack
legendary.desc: The elder dinosaur makes one claw attack, tail attack, wing attack, or flipper attack.

legendary.name: Move
legendary.desc: The elder dinosaur moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Chomp (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.desc: The elder dinosaur makes one bite attack or uses its Swallow.
